subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Transfering my recorded session to my computer
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Kay,

check the Audio I/O settings (Edit > Preferences > Audio I/O);
the Playback and Recording devices should show your sound card, and not
some other devices as modems, webcams, etc.).

Stefan

-- 

> Margaret 

> I am getting an error message when I start the record button on the 
> Audacity program.

>  It says Error while opening sound device. Please check the imput 
> device setting and the project sample rate.

> Any advice?

> Kay
